page.title: 16CLUBS IN BISHOPS
page.content: In Bishops Itchington there are over thirty five{clubs and groups}to help you enjoy yourself. For the young people there are cubs, guides, gym and tap dancing. For the{older generation there is a luncheon club, where people over 7O can come along, meet all together and have a cooked dinner. There is a playgroup where toddlers can have fun. Also there is a Bishops Itchington{Wheelchair Fund,}football clubs, fishing club, and also four different pubs; British Legion, Malt Shovel, Greaves Club and Butchers Arms. Every month there is a disco at the school. If you have a{birthday}or a{wedding}in the village there is a lady who makes cakes. Her name is Mrs. Fisher. There is plenty of countryside around, and there is a brook (River Itchen) nearby. By this brook is a park.
